item4.ingredient: Sambal Oelek or Chili Garlic Sauce

instructions.step1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line baking sheet with parchment
instructions.step2: In a large bowl mix all the meatball ingredients, form into 1" balls, place on baking sheet, cook for 20-25 minutes
instructions.step3: Meanwhile in medium bowl mix glaze ingredients, add cooked meatballs and toss until coated
instructions.step4: Garnish with chopped chives or green ends of onions

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, and baking powder in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a seperate bowl beat egg, then add oil and buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, adding additional buttermilk to proper consistancy. Do not overmix. Let rest 10-30 minutes
instructions.step4: Cook in non-stick skillet at 325-350 degrees

instructions.step1: Combine flour, oats, baking powder and spice in mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a seperate bowl beat egg, then mix in oil and pumpkin, add buttermilk and blend thoroughly
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients, adding milk to proper consistancy. Do not overmix. Let rest 10-30 minutes
